headline: 3M Looks Into the Future: Long-Term Gain, but Potential Short-Term Pain
summary: 3M's (NYSE: MMM) CEO Bill Brown recently gave a presentation at the JPMorgan Industrial Conference, and his remarks contained some mixed news for investors.  There's little 3M can do about its end markets.
